#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pu push
#define mod 1000000007
//#define f first
#define s second
#define ll long long int
ll a,b,ans;
ll val;
vector< ll >v ;
int main()
{
    ll time = 10000000000000ll;
    ll n,t;
    cin>>t>>n;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&val);
        v.pb(val);
    }
    ll ci=0ll;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        ci+=time/v[i];
    }
    ll b=0;ll e = time;
    ll mid ;
    ll prevci = ci;
    while(b<e)
    { //cout<<mid<<endl;
      mid  = (b+e)/2;
      ci=0ll;
       for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
        ci+=mid/v[i];

      if(ci>=n)
        e = mid;
      else
        b = mid+1;


    }
    cout<<b;
  return 0;
}
